sourcing.instructions: Ag: Jewelry supply stores or online metal suppliers. Cd: Chemical supply companies. In: Electronic component suppliers. Ni: Metal supply stores. Y: Chemical supply companies.
steps: Ag: Jewelry supply stores or online metal suppliers. Cd: Chemical supply companies. In: Electronic component suppliers. Ni: Metal supply stores. Y: Chemical supply companies.
1. Measure each ingredient using a precision scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure each ingredient using a precision scale.

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours).

steps: 1. Use a grinder or sandpaper to smooth out any rough edges of the solid sample.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Use a grinder or sandpaper to smooth out any rough edges of the solid sample.
